content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --TRT
      operator: equal_to
      value: MULTIPLE
Core:
  Id: CORE-000163
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --TRT = 'MULTIPLE'
Outcome:
  Message: --TRT is equal to 'MULTIPLE'
  Output Variables:
    - --TRT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0345
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: If multiple values are reported for a topic variable
                  (i.e., --TRT in an Interventions general-observation-class dataset
                  or --TERM in an Events general-observation-class dataset), it is
                  expected that the sponsor will split the values into multiple records
                  or otherwise resolve the multiplicity per the sponsor's data management
                  standard operating procedures.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 4.2.8.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - INTERVENTIONS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

Citations.Cited_Guidance: If multiple values are reported for a topic variable (i.e., --TRT in an Interventions general-observation-class dataset or --TERM in an Events general-observation-class dataset), it is expected that the sponsor will split the values into multiple records or otherwise resolve the multiplicity per the sponsor's data management standard operating procedures.
